content:
On behalf of North American Telugu Society (NATS), we are pleased to invite you to
America Telugu Sambaralu being held at NJ Expo Center, 97 Sun Field Ave,
Edison, NJ from May 26 th to May 28 th 2023.
North America Telugu Society (NATS) is one of the largest non-profit national
organizations representing Telugu speaking people of North America. NATS primary
objective is to address the issues and concerns that affect the everyday lives of
Telugu people living in North America. America Telugu Sambaralu (NATS Biennial
National conference), is being held at NJ Expo Center, 97 Sun Field Ave, Edison, NJ
from May 26 th to May 28 th 2023. This three-day event is packed with a variety of
activities including star-studded cultural programs, literary and spiritual activities,
CME sessions, Zellenial (Next generation group) programs and activities, alumni
meetings, health forums, Women’s forum, , motivational speeches and business
seminars. This conference serves the purpose of providing a platform to exchange
ideas, interact with each other, and celebrate a rich cultural heritage along with
NATS basic principle of ‘SERVING THE COMMUNITY’. More information about our
conference can be found at http://www.sambaralu.org/.

We are glad to inform you that NATS is making arrangements to celebrate 100 years
of Sri Ghantasala garu (May 26,2023), 100 years of Sri Allu Ramalingaiah garu (May
27,2023), 100 years of Sri NTR garu (May 28,2023) in a grand style. NATS takes pride
to celebrate above legends who impacted lives of Telugu people for several
decades. NATS utilizes every opportunity to preserve and promote Telugu literary
and culture. As part of this endeavor, we have planned several literary sessions
including Ragavadhanam We will be delighted to invite you as a guest during our
convention looking forward to hearing a positive reply from you.
